descriptor.name: EATIKO OFFICIAL PROVIDER
descriptor.long_desc: Tasty Foods offers a wide variety of delicious and affordable meals prepared with high-quality ingredients.

descriptor.name: Indian Feast
descriptor.short_desc: A bold collection of iconic Indian dishes and sweets.
descriptor.long_desc: This menu brings together flavorful Indian street food appetizers, rich curry mains, and indulgent traditional desserts, accompanied by signature beverages like chai and lassi.

descriptor.name: Apples
descriptor.long_desc: Freshly picked organic apples from local farms.

descriptor.name: Butter Chicken
descriptor.long_desc: Tender chicken cooked in a buttery tomato gravy, served with naan bread.

descriptor.name: Classic Butter Chicken
descriptor.short_desc: Rich, creamy tomato-based curry with marinated chicken
descriptor.long_desc: Tender chicken cooked in a smooth, creamy tomato gravy, flavored with a blend of aromatic spices like garam masala, cumin, and coriander.

descriptor.name: Medium Spicy
descriptor.short_desc: Succulent chicken pieces cooked in clay oven.
descriptor.long_desc: Succulent chicken pieces cooked in clay oven.
